summary: Karin, a young woman from the Baltic countries, marries fisherman Antonio to escape from a prison camp. But she cannot get used to the tough life in Antonio's volcano-threatened village, Stromboli.
cast: Ingrid Bergman|Mario Vitale|Renzo Cesana|Mario Sponzo|Gaetano Famularo|Angelo Molino|Roberto Onorati
title: Stromboli
